mapper.select:
SELECT eo.offer_id, eo.offer_no, i.item_name, i.item_id, customer.customer_name, elev.num, FORMAT(eo.total,'000,000.00') as total, u.USERNAME, eo.instance_id, eo.instance_status FROM tb_e_offer AS eo LEFT JOIN tb_item AS i ON eo.item_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_core UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_merchant UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_ordinary ) AS customer ON i.customer_no = customer.customer_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT *, COUNT(id) AS num FROM tb_elevator_details GROUP BY item_id ) AS elev ON eo.item_id = elev.item_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS u ON eo.offer_user = u.USER_ID where 1=1
and i.item_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pd.item_name}),'%')
and u.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pd.user_name}),'%')
and eo.instance_status LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pd.instance_status}),'%')

SELECT i.*, customer.customer_name,COUNT(ed.id) as ednum,us.USERNAME FROM tb_item AS i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_core UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_merchant UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_ordinary ) AS customer ON i.customer_no = customer.customer_no LEFT JOIN tb_elevator_details as ed ON i.item_id=ed.item_id LEFT JOIN sys_user as us ON i.input_user=us.USER_ID WHERE i.item_status = '2'
and i.item_name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.item_name}),'%')
GROUP BY i.item_id ORDER BY i.input_date DESC

SELECT i.*, customer.customer_name FROM tb_item AS i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_core UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_merchant UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_ordinary ) AS customer ON i.customer_no = customer.customer_no where item_no=#{item_no}

SELECT eo.*, i.*, customer.customer_name FROM tb_e_offer as eo LEFT JOIN tb_item as i ON eo.item_id=i.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_core UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_merchant UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_ordinary ) AS customer ON i.customer_no = customer.customer_no WHERE offer_no = #{offer_no}

SELECT ed.id, ed.no, ed.item_id, m.models_name, m.models_id, m.elevator_id, COUNT(models_name) as modelsNum, COUNT(IF(flag='1',flag,NULL)) as WNum, COUNT(IF(flag='2',flag,NULL)) as YNum FROM tb_elevator_details as ed LEFT JOIN (select models_id,elevator_id,models_name from tb_models ) as m ON ed.models_id=m.models_id WHERE item_id = #{pd.item_id} GROUP BY models_name
SELECT ed.id as elevID FROM tb_elevator_details as ed WHERE flag = "1" AND ed.models_id = #{models_id} AND ed.item_id = #{item_id}
SELECT offer_no,offer_date FROM tb_e_offer ORDER BY offer_date DESC LIMIT 1
select escalator_standard_price from tb_escalator_standard where id in( select es_id from tb_escalator_config where id=#{id})
select name from tb_escalator_config where id=#{id}
select * from tb_elevator_keyword where keyword=#{keyword}
select price_type from tb_elevator_keyword where keyword=#{keyword} limit 1
select price,unit,price_type,remark,dlvr_date from tb_elevator_keyword where keyword=#{keyword} and param=#{param}

select sum(price) as price from tb_elevator_keyword where keyword =#{keyword} and param in
#{param}
select formula,unit,price_type,remark,dlvr_date from tb_elevator_keyword where keyword=#{keyword}
select price,unit,price_type,remark,dlvr_date from tb_elevator_keyword where keyword=#{keyword}

mapper.insert: insert into tb_escalator( esca_id, offer_id, model_id, esca_angle, esca_spec, esca_width, esca_num, discount, floor, eqpt_price, disc_price, install_price, trans_price, last_offer, esca_base, esca_part, esca_std, esca_opt, esca_env, esca_unstd, elevator_id )values( #{esca_id}, #{offer_id}, #{model_id}, #{esca_angle}, #{esca_spec}, #{esca_width}, #{esca_num}, #{discount}, #{floor}, #{eqpt_price}, #{disc_price}, #{install_price}, #{trans_price}, #{last_offer}, #{esca_base}, #{esca_part}, #{esca_std}, #{esca_opt}, #{esca_env}, #{esca_unstd}, #{elevator_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM act_re_procdef WHERE KEY_ = #{KEY}

SELECT eo.*, i.item_name, customer.customer_name, elev.num, FORMAT(eo.total,'000,000.00') as total, u.USERNAME FROM tb_e_offer AS eo LEFT JOIN tb_item AS i ON eo.item_id = i.item_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_core UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_merchant UNION SELECT customer_no, customer_name FROM tb_customer_ordinary ) AS customer ON i.customer_no = customer.customer_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT *, COUNT(id) AS num FROM tb_elevator_details GROUP BY item_id ) AS elev ON eo.item_id = elev.item_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS u ON eo.offer_user = u.USER_ID where eo.offer_id=#{offer_id}
select * from tb_transportation where province_id=#{province_id} and city_id=#{city_id}

select * from tb_loc_destination where 1=1
and province_id = #{province_id}

SL_,FEIYUE_ZK AS ZK_, FEIYUE_ZHJ AS ZHJ_,FEIYUE_SBJ AS SBJ_,FEIYUE_ZHSBJ AS ZHSBJ_,FEIYUE_SJBJ AS SJBJ_,CONCAT(BZ_C,'/',BZ_Z,'/',BZ_M) AS CZM_ FROM TB_FEIYUE UNION SELECT ITEM_ID,'新飞越MRL' AS MODELS_,FEIYUEMRL_ID AS ID_,FEIYUEMRL_AZF AS AZF_,FEIYUEMRL_YSF AS YSF_,FEIYUEMRL_SL AS SL_,FEIYUEMRL_ZK AS ZK_, FEIYUEMRL_ZHJ AS ZHJ_,FEIYUEMRL_SBJ AS SBJ_,FEIYUEMRL_ZHSBJ AS ZHSBJ_,FEIYUEMRL_SJBJ AS SJBJ_,CONCAT(BZ_C,'/',BZ_Z,'/',BZ_M) AS CZM_ FROM TB_FEIYUE_MRL UNION SELECT ITEM_ID,'DNP9300' AS MODELS_,DNP9300_ID AS ID_,DNP9300_AZF AS AZF_,DNP9300_YSF AS YSF_,DNP9300_SL AS SL_,DNP9300_ZK AS SL_, DNP9300_ZHJ AS ZHJ_,DNP9300_SBJ AS SBJ_,DNP9300_ZHSBJ AS ZHSBJ_,DNP9300_SJBJ AS SJBJ_,'--/--/--' AS CZM_ FROM TB_DNP9300 UNION SELECT ITEM_ID,'DNR' AS MODELS_,DNR_ID AS ID_,DNR_AZF AS AZF_,DNR_YSF AS YSF_,DNR_SL AS SL_,DNR_ZK AS ZK_, DNR_ZHJ AS ZHJ_,DNR_SBJ AS SBJ_,DNR_ZHSBJ ZHSBJ_,DNR_SJBJ AS SJBJ_,'--/--/--' AS CZM_ FROM TB_DNR )A WHERE A.ITEM_ID=#{ITEM_ID}
SELECT tb_bjc.BJC_ZK, tb_models.elevator_id FROM tb_bjc LEFT JOIN tb_models ON tb_bjc.BJC_MODELS=tb_models.models_id WHERE BJC_ITEM_ID=#{item_id}
